title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 342.4 - Corrected filings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 342.4 - Corrected filings

State Regulations

If the reporting entity files a corrected report of assets
and liabilities or report of condition with the appropriate Federal regulatory
authority, it will immediately notify the superintendent in writing of such
corrected filing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
342.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
